com.edgar.banner.indicator

类 CirclePageIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.edgar.banner.indicator.CirclePageIndicator
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, PageIndicator, LoopViewPager.OnPageChangeListener

    public class CirclePageIndicator
extends android.view.View
implements PageIndicator
    Draws circles (one for each view). The current view position is filled and others are only stroked.

      • setCurrentItem

        public void setCurrentItem(int item)
        从接口复制的说明: PageIndicator

        Set the current page of both the ViewPager and indicator.

        This must be used if you need to set the page before the views are drawn on screen (e.g., default start page).

        指定者:
        setCurrentItem 在接口中 PageIndicator

      • setCurrentItem

        public void setCurrentItem(int item,
                           boolean smoothScroll)
        从接口复制的说明: PageIndicator
        Set the currently selected page.
        指定者:
        setCurrentItem 在接口中 PageIndicator
        参数:
        item - Item index to select
        smoothScroll - True to smoothly scroll to the new item, false to transition immediately

      • notifyDataSetChanged

        public void notifyDataSetChanged()
        从接口复制的说明: PageIndicator
        Notify the indicator that the fragment list has changed.

        notifyDataSetChanged 在接口中 PageIndicator

      • onPageScrollStateChanged

        public void onPageScrollStateChanged(int state)
        从接口复制的说明: LoopViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        Called when the scroll state changes. Useful for discovering when the user begins dragging, when the pager is automatically settling to the current page, or when it is fully stopped/idle.
        指定者:
        onPageScrollStateChanged 在接口中 LoopViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        参数:
        state - The new scroll state.
        另请参阅:
        ViewPager.SCROLL_STATE_IDLE, ViewPager.SCROLL_STATE_DRAGGING, ViewPager.SCROLL_STATE_SETTLING

      • onPageScrolled

        public void onPageScrolled(int position,
                           float positionOffset,
                           int positionOffsetPixels)
        从接口复制的说明: LoopViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        This method will be invoked when the current page is scrolled, either as part of a programmatically initiated smooth scroll or a user initiated touch scroll.
        指定者:
        onPageScrolled 在接口中 LoopViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        参数:
        position - Position index of the first page currently being displayed. Page position+1 will be visible if positionOffset is nonzero.
        positionOffset - Value from [0, 1) indicating the offset from the page at position.
        positionOffsetPixels - Value in pixels indicating the offset from position.

      • onPageSelected

        public void onPageSelected(int position)
        从接口复制的说明: LoopViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        This method will be invoked when a new page becomes selected. Animation is not necessarily complete.
        指定者:
        onPageSelected 在接口中 LoopViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        参数:
        position - Position index of the new selected page.
